issue.title: [Docs] Clarify Java support for ORC and Parquet via JNI bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12773](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12773). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ["Implementation Status" document](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/status.html#third-party-data-formats) says that Java support Parquet format by JNI while not support ORC format. However, the [source code](https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/aa28470/java/adapter) shows that Java support ORC format by JNI while not support Parquet format. See the attached snapshots for further details.

 ![image-2021-05-13-20-31-52-890.png](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/13025420/image-2021-05-13-20-31-52-890.png)
